remarks: Conversion of implicit substitution to explicit class substitution. (Contributed by NM, 16-Dec-2008.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Dec-2013.)
statement:
sbc2ie.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
sbc2ie.2 $e |- B e. _V $.
sbc2ie.3 $e |- ( ( x = A /\ y = B ) -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
sbc2ie $p |- ( [. A / x ]. [. B / y ]. ph <-> ps ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B y $.
$d ps x y $.
